attributes.action: Advance the Access to Mental Health Services Bill
attributes.additional_details:
The aforementioned Bill, which aims to introduce maximum waiting times and improve accessibility to Mental Heath Services, was read under the 10 minute rule on 10.09.2013. It has not progressed since then and the website 'Parliament.uk' states that 'there is no indication of when the Bill will progress further'.
This petition aims to reinforce the importance of the Access to Mental Health Services Bill  so that it may be moved for debate and progress through the House of Commons.
